briefTitle: Transformation Potential of E2 Exposed Breast Cancer Susceptibility Gene Mutation Heterozygous Epithelial Breast Cells
officialTitle: Identification of the Transformation Potential of Normal Estrogen Exposed BRCA1 (Breast Cancer Susceptibility Gene 1) and BRCA2 (Breast Cancer Susceptibility Gene 2) Heterozygous Epithelial Breast Cells Due to Irradiation
conditions: BRCA1 Gene Mutation, BRCA2 Gene Mutation
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The transcriptional profile of heterozygous epithelial breast cells
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* healthy
* premenopausal
* women
* BRCA1 mutations
* BRCA2 mutations

Exclusion Criteria:

* women with breast or ovarian cancer
